law.catch_line: Payment of contingent, unliquidated or future claims.

text.section: If a claim which will mature at a future time, or a contingent or unliquidated claim, matures or becomes certain before the distribution of the estate, and if the claim has been allowed, it shall be paid in the same manner as matured and absolute claims of the same class.

law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1988.
